ability.desc:

Demacia: Execute targets below @ModifiedDemaciaExecuteThreshold@ (%i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%) Health.

Ionia: Blasts split an additional time, dealing @IoniaDamageReduction*100@% damage.
Ixtal: Gain a random Region's effect on combat start and every @ExplorerProcRate@ seconds.
Noxus: Blasts now pierce targets, dealing @NoxusPercentDamageReduction*100@% reduced damage per enemy hit.
Piltover: Every third cast is Overcharged, dealing @PiltoverOverchargePercentBonus*100@% more damage.
Shadow Isles: Increase blast damage by @ModifiedShadowIslesBonusDamage@ (%i:scaleSouls%).
Shurima: Knock up enemies for @ShurimaKnockUpDuration@ seconds, with a chance to dredge up Gold or Treasures.
Targon: Heal the lowest Health ally for @TargonHealPercent*100@% of the damage dealt.
Void: Ignore @VoidResistIgnore*100@% of enemies' Armor and Magic Resistance.
Yordle: Shrink targets hit, lowering their damage by @YordleDamageReductionPercent*100@% percent for @YordleDamageReductionDuration@ seconds.
Zaun: Poison targets, dealing @ZaunDamage@ magic damage @ModifiedZaunTicks@ (%i:scaleAS%) times over @ZaunPoisonDuration@ seconds.

Each item he is equipped with grants him @FlatHealthPerItem1Star@/@FlatHealthPerItem2Star@/@FlatHealthPerItem3Star@ max Health. Artifacts grant @ArtifactMult*100@% more.

traits.name: Blacksmith

traits.desc:
Whenever ANY champion dies, gain Souls (%i:scaleSouls%). Shadow Isles champions' Abilities are uniquely empowered based on the number of Souls you have.

Shadow Isles champions gain Attack Damage and Ability Power.

(@MinUnits@) @SoulMult@x %i:scaleSouls%, @ADAP*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) @SoulMult@x %i:scaleSouls%, @ADAP*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) @SoulMult@x %i:scaleSouls%, @ADAP*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) @SoulMult@x %i:scaleSouls%, @ADAP*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%

Souls Collected: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT16_ShadowIsles_SoulsPlayerFacing@ %i:scaleSouls%
traits.name: Shadow Isles

traits.desc:
Each time an enemy champion dies, gain @ManaPerEnemyDeath@ Mana. Casting abilities does not consume Mana.

All enemies lose @EnemyArmorMRReduction@ Armor and Magic Resist.
traits.name: Harvester

traits.desc:
While Xin Zhao is not on your board, Zaahen gains the Ionia, Demacia, and Warden traits.

On kill, Zaahen gains a stack of Determination for the rest of combat. If he has @FocusNeededToRevive@ or more Determination when dying, he spends it to revive and restore @PercentMaxHealthHeal*100@% max Health.
traits.name: Immortal

traits.desc:
Galio cannot be fielded in combat. Instead, his traits count from the bench and when Demacians Rally, he joins the fight.

On landing, he creates a @HexRadius@-hex shockwave that deals @PercentMaxHP*100@% of his max Health as magic damage. Enemies hit are knocked up for @KnockupDuration@ seconds, reduced by distance from the center.
traits.name: Heroic

traits.desc:
After the enemy team has lost @HPLostTrigger*100@% of their Health, summon Atakhan, Bringer of Ruin. Each Noxian champion's star level increases his power.

(@MinUnits@) He slashes enemies, dealing magic damage.
(@MinUnits@) Noxians get more powerful the longer he is alive.
(@MinUnits@) He drains the souls of enemies on cast.
(@MinUnits@) After @RuinTimer@ seconds, BRING RUIN.
traits.name: Noxus

traits.desc:
(@MinUnits@) Yordles gain @BonusHealth@ Health and @AS*100@% Attack Speed for each unique Yordle fielded. 3 star Yordles grant @BonusMultiplier*100@% more!
(@MinUnits@) AND your first shop each round has a Yordle in it!
(@MinUnits@) AND get @FreeRerolls@ free rerolls each round!
(@MinUnits@) AND get a Yordle Grab Bag each round!
traits.name: Yordle

traits.desc:
After @InitialDelay@ seconds, Zaunites become Shimmer-Fused, granting them @ShimmerFuseDurability*100@% Durability and @ShimmerFuseAttackSpeed*100@% decaying Attack Speed for @ShimmerFuseDuration@ seconds.

After a short cooldown, they become Shimmer-Fused again.

(@MinUnits@) Refresh after @RefreshSeconds@ seconds.
(@MinUnits@) At @HealThreshold*100@% Health, Zaunites restore @MaxHealthHeal*100@% Health over @HealDuration@ seconds and instantly become Shimmer-Fused.
(@MinUnits@) Shimmer-Fused bonuses are increased by @ShimmerFustMult*100@%. Refresh after @RefreshSeconds@ seconds instead.
traits.name: Zaun

traits.desc:
Your team gains @TeamFlatHealth@ maximum Health. Bruisers gain more.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusPercentHealth*100@% %i:scaleHealth%
traits.name: Bruiser

traits.desc:
Every @CastsToGainXP@ casts, the Chronokeeper stores @XPPerCast@ XP. If he has enough stored for you to level up, he transfers you the required XP.

If you are level 10, he instead gains @DAGainAtMaxLevel@% Damage Amp.

Stored XP: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT16_ChronoKeeperStoredXP@
traits.name: Chronokeeper

traits.desc:
When Wardens first drop below @FirstShieldPercentHealth*100@% and @SecondShieldPercentHealth*100@% Health, they gain a Shield based on their max Health.

(@MinUnits@) @PercentHealthShield*100@% %i:scaleHealth%
traits.name: Warden

traits.desc:
Ionians gain Shield, Attack Damage, and Ability Power. Each game, they walk a different path.

@TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT16_Ionia_PathTooltip@

(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount*100@% %i:scaleHealth% Shield, @ADAP*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount*100@% %i:scaleHealth% Shield, @ADAP*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount*100@% %i:scaleHealth% Shield, @ADAP*100@% %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%
traits.name: Ionia

traits.desc:
Your team gains @TeamwideArmorMR@ Armor and Magic Resist. Defenders gain more.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusArmorMR@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%
traits.name: Defender

traits.desc: When Vayne casts on an enemy afflicted with Black Mist, she fires @NumBonusBolts@ extra bolts at @BoltEffectiveness*100@% effectiveness. When she gets a takedown, Lucian and Senna gain @LucianSennaAS*100@% Attack Speed.
traits.name: Sentinels of Light

traits.desc: While your strongest Neeko is alive, your strongest Nidalee cannot be targeted by basic attacks and gains @Durability*100@% Durability.
traits.name: Huntress

TFT16_OpeningEncounter_ArtifactAnvil.EncounterRulesText: Ornn forges you an Artifact Anvil.

TFT16_OpeningEncounter_ComponentAnvils.EncounterRulesText: Poppy grants you two component anvils.

TFT16_OpeningEncounter_GoldAll.EncounterRulesText: Twisted Fate deals out all gold tier augments this game.

TFT16_OpeningEncounter_GoldSubscription.EncounterRulesText: Tahm Kench grants you gold each stage.

TFT16_OpeningEncounter_LootSubscription.EncounterRulesText: Zoe gives you highly varied loot at the start of each stage!

TFT16_OpeningEncounter_PrismaticAll.EncounterRulesText: Seraphine turns all augments to prismatic tier this game.

TFT16_OpeningEncounter_PrismaticFirst.EncounterRulesText: Galio's entrance turns the first augment to prismatic this game.

TFT16_OpeningEncounter_PrismaticLast.EncounterRulesText: Zilean ages the last augment to perfection. It will be prismatic this game.

TFT16_OpeningEncounter_ScuttlePuddle.EncounterRulesText: Rift Herald happily fills the game with crabs carrying bonus loot.

TFT16_OpeningEncounter_EmblemEnsemble.EncounterRulesText: Ryze grants you 3 random emblems to begin your journey.

TFT16_OpeningEncounter_NoEncounter.EncounterRulesText: It's a calm day in Runeterra. No encounter this game.

TFT16_OpeningEncounter_ThreeCostStart.EncounterRulesText: Start with a random 3-cost champion this game.

TFT16_OpeningEncounter_UpgradedStart.EncounterRulesText: Ekko upgrades your starting champion to 2-star.

TFT16_OpeningEncounter_TwoCostStart.EncounterRulesText: Start with a random 2-cost champion this game.

TFT16_OpeningEncounter_AugmentRoundSwap.EncounterRulesText: LeBlanc manipulates augments to be offered earlier this game.

TFT16_OpeningEncounter_AugmentRerolls.EncounterRulesText: Teemo's scouting party has found +1 Augment reroll for all augments.
TFT16_OpeningEncounter_AugmentRerolls.name: Scouting Party

TFT16_OpeningEncounter_FiveOneCostStart.EncounterRulesText: Gain 5 random 1-costs to fight on the Howling Abyss.

TFT16_OpeningEncounter_GoldOnPlayerDeath.EncounterRulesText: Whenever a player is eliminated, Draven rewards surviving players with gold per eliminated player.

TFT16_OpeningEncounter_LastTwoStanding.EncounterRulesText: The last two surviving players gain 70 gold for an epic final fight.
TFT16_OpeningEncounter_LastTwoStanding.name: Silver Scrapes

TFT16_OpeningEncounter_GwensGifts.EncounterRulesText: After the first 3 carousels, Gwen gifts players a random component and a special pair of scissors.
TFT16_OpeningEncounter_GwensGifts.name: After the first 3 carousels, Gwen gifts players a random component and a special pair of scissors.
